about_the_game:
Banu lives in the Middle East. Her ex-husband died in a car accident. She remarried to Kamil only for her 2 year old daughter. She wanted to bring her up like the other children, with the care of both father and mother. That is why she accepted when Kamil, who grew up in the same neighborhood with her, made a proposal to her. Kamil has true feelings for her. But, what about Banu?...Banu's fate will be in your hands.

Banu considers herself a strict religious woman. She was brought up by a religious family(Not her own family. She was adopted). However, she isn't that pure woman. She likes to show off her body shape, she lies to her husband, has dirty thoughts and dreams and she enjoys men's attention. Kamil doesn't have so much control over Banu as he loves her so much and does anything to make her happy. Banu has so much control in the relationship and you will have control over Banu!

The game runs in 1920-1080 resolution. There're 8 complete different routes in the game. You can stay with Kamil and stay true to him or cheat on him or you can break up with him and explore more opportunities. The status indicators on top of the screen will guide you through the game. Sometimes you'll have to play again to unlock the blacked out choices.

Immerse yourself in the captivating world of "Life in Middle East," a choice-based adult visual novel. Make decisions that shape the narrative, leading to multiple intriguing endings. Experience intense romances, challenging societal norms, and exploring the boundaries of desire. Please be aware, the game contains adult content, including sensitive themes handled with respect. Indulge in the erotic scenes from the gallery menu and uncover the mysteries that await in this enticing adventure. For mature audiences only.

content_descriptors.notes: This NSFW game features explicit sexual content, including various acts like oral sex, threesomes, lesbian scenes, vaginal and anal sex, spanking, BDSM, voyeurism, non-penetrative sexual acts, incest, and non-consensual sexual acts. It also includes scenes of extreme violence, murder, rape, sexual assault, blackmail, drug abuse, the elements of death, fight and blood. All characters depicted are over the age of 18. The content of the game may be offensive to religious beliefs.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS, or recent 64 bit Linux release
  • Processor: Intel or AMD 64-bit capable processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated chipset
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: SteamOS, or recent 64 bit Linux release
  • Processor: Intel or AMD 64-bit capable processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia or ATi GPU with 1GB+ Memory
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: Life in Middle East

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2014 or newer Intel Core i5 / AMD
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2016 or newer Intel / AMD chipset
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia or ATi GPU with 2GB+ Memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: "Life in Middle East" is a choice-based adult visual novel where you make decisions for a pretty woman, Banu shaping her future while navigating through a Middle Eastern setting.
